general.name: portsmouth_stellarmass_plate
general.description: This file contains the output of the Portsmouth Spectro-Photometric Stellar Mass computation of the BOSS galaxy product, according to the algorithm documentation . for each PLATE-MJD.
general.naming_convention: portsmouth_stellarmass-pppp-mmmmm.fits, where pppp is a 4-digit plate number, and mmmmm is a 5-digit MJD.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

hdu0.name: PRIMARY
hdu0.description: The BOSS Galaxy product assumes a WMAP 7 ΛCDM cosmology with <var>H</var><sub>0</sub> = 70, Ω<sub>m</sub> = 0.274, and Ω<sub>Λ</sub> = 0.726.

hdu1.description: The BOSS Galaxy product assumes a WMAP 7 ΛCDM cosmology with <var>H</var><sub>0</sub> = 70, Ω<sub>m</sub> = 0.274, and Ω<sub>Λ</sub> = 0.726.

PLATE.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

FIBERID.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

DEC.description: Object Dec (Plug_Dec drilled fiber position) [J2000 degrees]

Z.name: Z
Z.description: Redshift (best pipeline galaxy z_noqso with zwarning_noqso=0)

Z_ERR.description: Redshift error (z_err_noqso) based upon fit to chi<sup>2</sup> minimum
Z_ERR.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

ZNUM.name: ZNUM
ZNUM.description: the znum-th best-fit corresponding to z_noqso (optional input to readspec)
ZNUM.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

MAGSCALED.name: MAGSCALED
MAGSCALED.description: MagScaled[ugriz] = modelmag[ugriz] + cmodelmag[i]-modelmag[i] - extinction[ugriz] (see PhotoObj for definitions).
MAGSCALED.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

MAGSCALED_ERR.name: MAGSCALED_ERR
MAGSCALED_ERR.description: MagScaled_err[ugriz] = MagScaled[ugriz] * modelmagerr[ugriz]/modelmag[ugriz] (see PhotoObj for definitions).
MAGSCALED_ERR.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

REDUCEDCHI2.description: Reduced chi squared of best fit
